description:
Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Price in Bangladesh October 2024

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 is now available in two variants (4/6GB/64/128GB RAM). Now, Xiaomi Redmi Note 10’s Price is BDT 19,999 Taka in Bangladesh. Redmi Note 10 has a 5000mAh battery with fast charging. This device is running with Android 11 and powered by the Qualcomm SDM678 Snapdragon 678 chipset.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 highlight

Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 will be launched in 2021, March. The Note 10 launched with the model number M2004J7AC, M2007J22C, M2007J17C. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 160.5 x 74.5 x 8.3 mm and the weight is 178.8 grams. Secondly, the display of the Redmi Note 10 is a 6.43-inch AMOLED panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution. The display is protecting with Corning Gorilla Glass. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Qualcomm SDM678 Snapdragon 678 and running with Android 11. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (2×2.2 GHz Kryo 460 Gold & 6×1.7 GHz Kryo 460 Silver) CPU.

Xiaomi Note 10 phone has a quad-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 48MP wide, 8MP ultrawide, 2MP macro, and 2MP depth camera. It has a 13MP selfie camera inside the punch hole of the display. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has two (4/6GB/64/128GB) variants. On the other hand, it can not support microSDXC on uses a shared SIM slot. Certainly, Redmi Note 10 has a 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Redmi Note 10 is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is side-mounted.

On the other hand, among the other features, there are WLAN, Bluetooth, FM Radio, USB port and Face unlock.

Your question and our opinion about Xiaomi Note 10

Which question you will have about this phone. Let’s justify these. There we are including the major question and answers about this phone. So, let’s start now.

When it will released?

It will launch in March, 2021.

What is the price of Xiaomi Redmi Note 10?

The price of Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 is BDT 19,999.

How much RAM and ROM does it contain?

It has two variants of 4/6GB in RAM & two variants of 64/128GB in ROM. But, overall you can get two variants (4GB/64GB,6GB/128GB) in market

Which type of display panel used in it?

It comes with a 6.43″ AMOLED Display panel with 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution.

How is the processor and chipset?

It contains Qualcomm SDM678 Snapdragon 678 chipset and Android 11. It has up to an Octa-core (2×2.2 GHz Kryo 460 Gold & 6×1.7 GHz Kryo 460 Silver) CPU.

What is the camera and video capabilities?

The quad-camera setup on the back 48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP and a 13MP selfie camera. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps.

Dose it is support 5G network?

No, It is support 4G network with 2G / 3G.

How the battery capacity is?

The battery capacity is 5000mAh Li-Polymer battery with fast charging.

What sensors does this phone have?

Fingerprint, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass.

Which country and company manufactured it?

Xiaomi manufactured it and this phone is made in China.

Reason to Buy

In this paragraph, we are going to describe the important major to buy this. Why a person may buy this smartphone? Firstly, when anyone wants to buy a device they find out the premium things on the device according to their price. So, let us find out some eligible things which are in Redmi Note 10.

Our Verdict

In conclusion, we are giving our verdict on this device. If you want to buy the best 4G smartphone under 20K Taka. Then Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 will in the first row among the best smartphones. Dear friends if you have an attraction to online games like Free Fire and so on then you can buy them. Because it has RAM and a well Processor using the Qualcomm SDM678 Snapdragon 678 chipset. If you want a big backup on charge then you can buy this. Because it has a huge 5000mAh battery. In addition, it’s a 4G supportable smartphone. So, you can get good network facilities on it. However, it has a quad-cam setup with a 48MP primary camera. So, it’s the image and video capability may be well. Therefore, to judge all of these reasons you can buy this.
